message.content: {"id": "50793", "title": "Bug 50793 - Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch", "description": "There is a bug in the ServletRequestListener where the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST rather than ASYNC after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(). This bug occurs when a ServletRequestListener is defined and invoked after the async dispatch. The actual servlet is correctly invoked with the type set to ASYNC. If the listener is intended to be invoked for each dispatch, then the DispatcherType returned in the listener should match the value returned by the filter/servlet.", "OB": "The bug occurs when a ServletRequestListener is defined and invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(). The DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.", "EB": "To fix this bug, the ServletRequestListener should return the correct DispatcherType, which is ASYNC, after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().", "SR": "Fix the logic in the ServletRequestListener to return the correct DispatcherType, ASYNC, after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch() to ensure consistent behavior."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

', 'EB': 'When the actual servlet is invoked, the type is correctly set to ASYNC.If the listener is intended to be invoked for each dispatch, then the DispatcherType should match the value returned in the filter/servlet.
